name: brikks
description:
Welcome to brikks!

A game where you can build and engineer anything... and then destroy it!

Please make sure you have read the readme file because it's really important.

Brikks is a free game about building and demolishing stuff made out of bricks, planks or dominoes. You can contol time, save, load or clone your creations. You can also summon dynamite, throw metal balls or use a bulldozer to demolish your buildings.
